title: Synergistic advances in natural fibre composites: a comprehensive review of the eco-friendly bio-composite development, its characterization and diverse applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17594-17611
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00149D, Review Article
Open Access

Santhosh Nagaraja, Praveena Bindiganavile Anand, Mohan Kumar K., Muhammad Imam Ammarullah
Through a critical evaluation of the existing literature, this article provides a detailed summary of NFCs for real-time engineering applications. It also provides insights into sustainability practices through NFCs.
